name: ConceptMapR5ConditionElementsForR4Condition
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Condition` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Condition`.
Element `Condition` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition`.
Element `Condition.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.meta`.
Element `Condition.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.implicitRules`.
Element `Condition.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.language`.
Element `Condition.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.text`.
Element `Condition.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.contained`.
Element `Condition.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.identifier`.

Note that the target element context `Condition.clinicalStatus` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Condition.clinicalStatus` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.clinicalStatus`.
Element `Condition.verificationStatus` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.verificationStatus`.
Element `Condition.category` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.category`.
Element `Condition.severity` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.severity`.
Element `Condition.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.code`.
Element `Condition.bodySite` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.bodySite`.
Element `Condition.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.subject`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead.
Element `Condition.subject` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Condition.patient`.
Element `Condition.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.encounter`.
Element `Condition.encounter` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Condition.context`.

Note that the target element context `Condition.onset[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.
Element `Condition.onset[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.onset[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Condition.onset[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.

Note that the target element context `Condition.abatement[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.
Element `Condition.abatement[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.abatement[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Condition.abatement[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.
Element `Condition.recordedDate` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.recordedDate`.
Element `Condition.recordedDate` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Condition.assertedDate`.
Element `Condition.recordedDate` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Condition.dateRecorded`.
Element `Condition.participant` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Condition`, but has no target element specified.

Element `Condition.participant.function` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.participant` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Condition.participant.function` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Condition`, but has no target element specified.

Element `Condition.participant.actor` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.participant` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Condition.participant.actor` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Condition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Condition.stage` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.stage`.
Element `Condition.stage.summary` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.stage.summary`.
Element `Condition.stage.assessment` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.stage.assessment`.
Element `Condition.stage.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.stage.type`.
Element `Condition.stage.type` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Condition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Condition.evidence` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.evidence`.
Element `Condition.note` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Condition.note`.
Element `Condition.note` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Condition.notes`.
